1.name: Eva
1.text: NFTs are digital assets that represent ownership of unique content using blockchain technology

2.name: Eva
2.text: They're popular in digital art and allow creators to receive direct compensation

3.name: Eva
3.text: However, concerns exist about their environmental impact

4.name: Eva
4.text: NFTs are innovative and have the potential to empower creators and disrupt traditional industries

4.name: Eva
4.text: And Finally you shouldn't invest in them
